articles.title: Nintendo plans to produce 22 million Switch devices to address supply shortages - Business Insider Australia
articles.description: Nintendo’s Switch has sold more than 52 million units in just over three years, but the console remains a hot commodity. Right now, it’s nearly impossible to buy a Nintendo Switch without paying nearly two times the usual list price.
